name: Deeper (EOShadows)
description:
Play as a cute little spirit as you bust your way deeper and deeper into the earth to find your friend.  

CONTROLS:

  • You play with your mouse.
  • Click on any plain square to move, as long as it's not diagonally across from you.
  • Your goal is to break the barrier at the bottom of the screen so you can dig deeper underground.

Made for the Ludum Dare 48 in 72 hours.
